title: Kate and Laurel Lipton Modern Two Tier Tray, 13 x 13 x 20, White and Gold, Glam Decorative Tray
features: LOVELY DESIGN: The Lipton tray features two tiers with a round shape that gives it a beautiful modern look
FABULOUS FINISH: The Lipton two tier tray features a matte white finish, while the decorative rod has a lovely gold finish
LARGE SIZE: The two tiers are 12 and 9 inches in diameter, while the overall dimensions are 13 inches wide by 13 inches deep by 20 inches tall
MULTIFUNCTIONAL: Use this lovely tray as a vanity tray, a dessert tray, or a catch-all for household items
PROTECTED: The Lipton two tier tray features protective pads on the bottom of the base to prevent scuffing and damage to your hard surfaces
description: This glamorous tray is perfect for showcasing your elegant, modern style. The Lipton two-tiered tray is a perfect addition to your display surface. Inspired by modern geometry and glamorous aesthetics, the Lipton tray has two round tiers with a lovely white finish, held together by a beautiful metal rod with a gold finish. The two tiers have graduated diameters, the upper tier being 10 inches while the lower tier is 13 inches. There are 8.25 inches between the two tiers, giving you plenty of room for storage and display opportunities. The Lipton two-tier tray can have various functions in the home: Use it as a jewelry, dessert, spice, or makeup tray, or use it as a bold centerpiece on your vanity, side, console, or entryway table. It dazzles and wows as a place to serve cupcakes or showcase your green thumb with succulents. Assembly for this tray takes minutes with a two-step assembly process saving you time and hassle. Protect your surfaces with the felt pads attached to the tray's bottom to prevent scuffing and damage.
